m_szDocTitle: Peugeot Quartz, The 500 Horsepower Plug-In SUV | CleanTechnica
m_szDocSumamry: Peugeot Quartz, The 500 Horsepower Plug-In SUV September 22nd, 2014 by Christopher DeMorro   Originally posted on GAS2 It’s been over 20 years since Peugeot sold a new car in the United States, and the 500 horsepower Peugeot Quartz plug-in hybrid SUV concept has me thinking it’s time for the French automaker to make a comeback. The Peugeot Quartz is the latest concept that takes a stunning design and applies a high-powered hybrid drivetrain to it. In this case the same 270 horsepower 1.6 liter turbocharged gas engine used for the Peugeot Exalt hybrid concept also drives the front wheels of the
